forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 3am, then rain showers likely and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 50. Southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. South wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. Southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 50. West northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 7pm, then freezing rain and a slight chance of sleet between 7pm and 1am, then freezing rain and rain. Cloudy, with a low around 30. East wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of around one inch possible

Cloudy. Low around 25, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails closed for the day. We will clean up the trails following this weather event.
nubsNob.comments:
Nub's Nob is Closed today due to heavy ice on the chairlifts and slopes. 

We plan to open tomorrow morning for skiing and riding at 9:00 AM if the weather allows. 

The last scheduled day of the season is April 6.
